verbose_text: Drosophila Dacapo (Dap), a member of the p21 CIP1 / p27 KIP1 family of Cdk inhibitors, can block progression from G1 into S phase by specifically inhibiting Cdk2 / CycE [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: p21 CIP1 /p27 KIP1  family of Cdk inhibitors, can block progression from G1 into S phase by specifically inhibiting Cdk2/CycE
